title: just a question
body:
how are you meant to get out of any ranked of bronze, when your constantly put with ppl who feed or are tilted from there previous games, it doesn't matter how good of a player you are if your adc and support are 0/8 each within 5 mins what are you meant to do?

any tips advice to stop this happening in what seems to be every match. last match i was 17/5 my whole team was 15 deaths or above. just makes no sense i understand this is bronze. but what the hell? someone save me from this nonsense lol.

replies.body:
[Stop blaming your teams, ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/E5KPW5Qx-playing-like-a-god-but-still-cant-climb-part-1) and [learn to deal with situations effectively. ](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-strategy/xeKp58HJ-playing-like-a-god-but-still-cant-climb-part-2)

There are plenty of ways that you can improve as a player, you just need to learn to be a  bit more self critical :) In the end, KDA doesn't win games. [Practice your CS](http://imgur.com/orWUCKH), optimise your masteries and runes, narrow your champ pool. [Watch videos](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=AX_xyl6qIlk) and read guides about objective prioritization/wave manipulation/other skills. 

If you still aren't finding success, try queuing up with some friends. Playing with people you can trust not to troll/afk/have internet issues can definitely help a lot. it's also more fun this way. 

Good luck ♥

Upgrade trinket when necessary.
Yellow is ok, but red and blue are good too, its also free.

Ward up your own lane, buy a pink.
Mute assholes.
get on with the game, less time typing means more time farming.

Might look into your match history later.
but for now here are some generic tips.
Cheers for the help, I'll have a go at implementing them later many thanks

Right, first of all.
You do not have completed tier 3 rune pages.
Save up some IP and buy some quints and try and buy another page, as you only have 2 pages.
--
Your CS is poor you need to work on it. (Go into bot games and just focus on farming not kills)
Should be about 60 CS every 10 mins MINIMUM, 80 CS is average.
You take too long upgrading boots and your trinket. Mainly your boots though.

I have room for 1 more person in my club "Helping Others Improve"
But first off, https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC8x_OF9Fo1vb8NkaASrXaXQ
Try looking into the Helping Others Improve series, that's the stuff I do.
You git gud and carry. Simples ;^)
